avdta.network.node

Class TurnRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.TurnRecord

  • public class TurnRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    A record of a Turn that assists in the representation and manipulation of PhaseRecord data. This class contains the ids of the Links of the associated Turn.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TurnRecord(int i, int j)
      Constructs this TurnRecord based on the specified Link ids.
      TurnRecord(Link i, Link j)
      Constructs this TurnRecord bsaed on the specified Links.
      TurnRecord(Turn t)
      Constructs this TurnRecord based on the specified Turn.
